option.name: fetch_size
option.description: API read chunk size in minutes

option.name: batch_size
option.description: Batch size for writes to Atlas

job.description: Pull data from Flock Safety API server daily at midnight for the entire previous day * Raw data is written by Flapper into the "flock_reads" table in the Atlas database
job.name: Recurring Flock: Pull RAW data daily by API

command.script:
#!/usr/bin/env bash
# JOB: Recurring Flock: Pull RAW data daily by API
# start at midnight PST of previous day start=$(date -d "-1 day" "+%Y-%m-%dT00:00:00%:z")
# FLAPPER variables are defined in /etc/environment $FLAPPER_PATH --file $FLAPPER_CONF \ --interval @option.fetch_size@ \ --batch-size @option.batch_size@ \ --start $start \ --hours 24
